what do u mean eligibility to victorious skins?
doesnt all above gold get it this time?
If your honour is below level 2 or if you've had a punishment for boosting (and a few other things), you will not be eligible for season rewards (including the Victorious skins) even if you are Gold+
Im silver 4 and my friend is silver 2 and we cant play a ranked game together because of the rank difference??

I am looking forward to see if this new Ezreal W does improve him or make him worse. Bit annoyed that you nerf 3 of my best champions in sion ahri and hail of blades for jhin but what can I do. I am not one of the pros. No point complaining about whats already been done.
Jhin wasn't nerfed, he had a bug where hail of blades still applied to Jhins passive even when it wasn't active
